lastHarvestRound - Variable in class ants.AntFoodSpawn
The last time food was harvested from the food spawn.
lastVisitRound - Variable in class ants.AntHill
The last time an ant visited the hill.
listener - Variable in class basis.GameServer
The client listener used to listen for incoming TCP connections and creating communicators to exchange with these clients.
listenerThread - Variable in class basis.TCPClientListener
The thread in charge of running the client listener mechanics.
LOAD_TIME_MS - Static variable in class basis.GameManager
The time of response a bot should respect to send its "gameactions" message after a "gamestate" message from the server.

Loads an ant map from a file.

Loads all maps files available in GameServer/res/maps/.
loadTime - Variable in class ants.AntGameReplayData
The loading time of the game.
loadTimeMs - Variable in class basis.Game
The time the server has to wait after "gamestart" message.
